Name: Ice Maiden
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A subtle Martini with the honeyed flavours of icewine melding with botanicals in the gin and balanced by the acidity of the white wine.
History: Created in 2004 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Ice Maiden contains 202 calories
